project:
Build complete admin dashboard frontend and API gateway:

GATEWAY (port 8500):
- Reverse proxy routing /api/v1/identity/* to :8501, /api/v1/oauth/* to :8502, /api/v1/governance/* to :8503, /api/v1/audit/* to :8504, /api/v1/admin/* to :8505, /api/v1/risk/* to :8506
- JWT validation at gateway, rate limiting 100 req/min/user with Redis sliding window
- Correlation ID on every request, structured access logging
- /health aggregating all downstream service health
- /api/docs serving combined OpenAPI spec

FRONTEND (React/TypeScript/Tailwind):
- Login page with email/password, MFA code input, remember device checkbox
- Sidebar navigation: Dashboard, Users, Groups, OAuth Apps, Audit Logs, Policies, Settings
- Dashboard page: total users card, active sessions count, failed logins today, risk alerts count, login activity line chart (last 7 days using recharts)
- Users page: sortable table with search and pagination, create user modal, edit user drawer, suspend/activate toggle, reset password action
- Audit Logs page: filterable table (by action, user, date range, outcome), auto-refresh toggle, export CSV button
- OAuth Apps page: list registered clients, create new client with redirect URIs, show client_secret once, delete with confirmation
- Settings page: password policy config (min length, complexity, expiry), session timeout, MFA enforcement toggle
- Auth context managing JWT access/refresh tokens, auto-refresh before expiry, redirect to login on 401
- Toast notifications for all actions, loading skeletons on data fetch, empty states with illustrations
- Responsive: collapsible sidebar on mobile

Wire frontend API calls to gateway endpoints. All pages must work end-to-end with real backend data.
